7a133fc114f6da10cee7d0c2ec7698d3.question_template: donne moi la courbe d'evolution d'inscriptions
7a133fc114f6da10cee7d0c2ec7698d3.sql_template:
SELECT YEAR(Date) AS annee, COUNT(*) AS total_inscriptions 
FROM inscriptioneleve 
GROUP BY YEAR(Date) 
ORDER BY annee

fefc83db0665109dc6c86ea1bf044527.sql_template: SELECT COUNT(*) as nombre_reinscriptions FROM inscriptioneleve ie WHERE ie.TypeInscri = 'R' AND ie.AnneeScolaire = (SELECT id FROM anneescolaire WHERE AnneeScolaire = '{AnneeScolaire}')

89d5c96a4f754dbc9862f83d2ef6b5dc.question_template: le nombre des eleves nouvellement inscris pour {AnneeScolaire}
89d5c96a4f754dbc9862f83d2ef6b5dc.sql_template:
SELECT COUNT(*) as nombre_eleves_nouvellement_inscris
FROM inscriptioneleve ie
JOIN anneescolaire a ON ie.AnneeScolaire = a.id
WHERE ie.TypeInscri = 'N' AND a.AnneeScolaire = '{AnneeScolaire}' AND ie.Annuler = '0'

2c36dc3b831ddd41137afd3ae50bbcc1.question_template: nombre des élèves accepté et non inscris pour {AnneeScolaire}
2c36dc3b831ddd41137afd3ae50bbcc1.sql_template:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS nombre_eleves_accepte_non_inscris
FROM preinscription p
JOIN anneescolaire a ON p.AnneeScolaire = a.id
WHERE p.Decision = 'Acceptée'
AND p.Eleve NOT IN (
    'SELECT' Eleve
    FROM inscriptioneleve ie
    WHERE ie.AnneeScolaire = a.id
)
AND a.AnneeScolaire = '{AnneeScolaire}'

6799af4e01dfb0ac0490107b0ae23128.question_template: le nombre des eleves par localité en {AnneeScolaire}
6799af4e01dfb0ac0490107b0ae23128.sql_template:
SELECT 
    l.LIBELLELOCALITEFR AS localite, 
    COUNT(*) AS nombre_eleves
FROM 
    eleve e
JOIN 
    personne p ON e.IdPersonne = p.id
LEFT JOIN 
    localite l ON p.Localite = l.IDLOCALITE
JOIN 
    inscriptioneleve ie ON e.id = ie.Eleve
JOIN 
    anneescolaire a ON ie.AnneeScolaire = a.id
WHERE 
    a.AnneeScolaire = '{AnneeScolaire}' 
    AND ie.Annuler = '0'
GROUP BY 
    l.LIBELLELOCALITEFR

9bc2c248fa8cda5ed2c5bf5cba9e38e5.question_template: le nombre des eleves inscrits par niveau pour {AnneeScolaire}
9bc2c248fa8cda5ed2c5bf5cba9e38e5.sql_template:
SELECT n.NOMNIVFR AS niveau, COUNT(*) AS nombre_eleves
FROM inscriptioneleve ie
JOIN classe c ON ie.Classe = c.id
JOIN niveau n ON c.IDNIV = n.id
JOIN anneescolaire a ON ie.AnneeScolaire = a.id
WHERE a.AnneeScolaire = '{AnneeScolaire}' AND ie.Annuler = '0'
GROUP BY n.NOMNIVFR

28fb8760485bbcd6a6643025873afd61.question_template: donne moi le nombre des absences par matières de {NomFr} {PrenomFr} pour {AnneeScolaire}
28fb8760485bbcd6a6643025873afd61.sql_template:
SELECT m.nomMatierefr AS matiere, COUNT(a.id) AS nombre_absences
FROM absence a
JOIN inscriptioneleve ie ON a.Inscription = ie.id
JOIN eleve e ON ie.Eleve = e.id
JOIN personne p ON e.IdPersonne = p.id
JOIN matiere m ON a.Matiere = m.id
JOIN anneescolaire an ON ie.AnneeScolaire = an.id
WHERE p.NomFr = '{NomFr}' AND p.PrenomFr = '{PrenomFr}' AND an.AnneeScolaire = '{AnneeScolaire}' AND a.Etat = '1'
GROUP BY m.nomMatierefr

d82319103d4b50d56c61fe890f84c945.question_template: donne moi le nombre des retards par matière de {NomFr} {PrenomFr}
d82319103d4b50d56c61fe890f84c945.sql_template:
SELECT m.NomMatiereFr AS matiere, COUNT(*) AS nombre_retards
FROM retard r
JOIN inscriptioneleve ie ON r.Inscription = ie.id
JOIN eleve e ON ie.Eleve = e.id
JOIN personne p ON e.IdPersonne = p.id
JOIN matiere m ON r.Matiere = m.id
WHERE p.NomFr = '{NomFr}' AND p.PrenomFr = '{PrenomFr}'
GROUP BY m.NomMatiereFr

23b345b27ede3b03e6e8a60ed4565db8.question_template: donne moi les dates et les durée de chaque retard effectué par {NomFr} {PrenomFr}
23b345b27ede3b03e6e8a60ed4565db8.sql_template:
SELECT r.Date, r.Duree 
FROM retard r
JOIN inscriptioneleve ie ON r.Inscription = ie.id
JOIN eleve e ON ie.Eleve = e.id
JOIN personne p ON e.IdPersonne = p.id
WHERE p.NomFr = '{NomFr}' AND p.PrenomFr = '{PrenomFr}'

ec20a1a42daba75b0a69eed7b6befba2.sql_template:
SELECT COUNT(*) as nombre_eleves
FROM eleve e
JOIN inscriptioneleve ie ON e.id = ie.Eleve
JOIN anneescolaire a ON ie.AnneeScolaire = a.id
WHERE a.AnneeScolaire = '{AnneeScolaire}' AND ie.annuler = '0'

df3723e2ac615b197bc6e41fa3b13e0c.sql_template: SELECT COUNT(*) as nombre_classes FROM classe

ad951962fdf5a1534695090a513503db.sql_template:
SELECT 
    p.NomFr AS NomEnseignant, 
    p.PrenomFr AS PrenomEnseignant, 
    m.NomMatiereFr AS Matiere, 
    s.nomSalleFr AS Salle, 
    sd.debut AS DebutSeance, 
    sf.fin AS FinSeance, 
    j.libelleJourFr AS Jour
FROM 
    emploidutemps edt
JOIN 
    enseingant e ON edt.enseignant = e.id
JOIN 
    personne p ON e.IdPersonne = p.id
JOIN 
    matiere m ON edt.matiere = m.id
JOIN 
    salle s ON edt.salle = s.id
JOIN 
    seance sd ON edt.SeanceDebut = sd.id
JOIN 
    seance sf ON edt.SeanceFin = sf.id
JOIN 
    jour j ON edt.jour = j.id
JOIN 
    classe c ON edt.classe = c.id
WHERE 
    c.CODECLASSEFR = '{CODECLASSEFR}'
ORDER BY 
    j.id, sd.debut

9881b453b18b35ba5c3d71008438ba36.question_template: donne moi les coordonné des parents de {NomFr} {PrenomFr}
9881b453b18b35ba5c3d71008438ba36.sql_template:
SELECT p.NomFr, p.PrenomFr, p.Tel1, p.Tel2, p.AdresseFr 
FROM parent pa 
JOIN personne p ON pa.personne = p.id 
JOIN parenteleve pe ON pa.id = pe.parent 
JOIN eleve e ON pe.eleve = e.id 
JOIN personne pe ON e.IdPersonne = pe.id 
WHERE pe.NomFr = '{NomFr}' AND pe.PrenomFr = '{PrenomFr}'

f877e2ef909997b80edf803325259716.sql_template:
SELECT c.CODECLASSEFR, c.NOMCLASSEFR 
FROM eleve e 
JOIN personne p ON e.IdPersonne = p.id 
JOIN inscriptioneleve ie ON e.id = ie.Eleve 
JOIN classe c ON ie.Classe = c.id 
WHERE p.NomFr = 'kouki' AND p.PrenomFr = 'bochra' AND ie.annuler = '0'

69d42433354c5f5003fd6c572885086c.sql_template: SELECT p.NomFr, p.PrenomFr FROM personne p WHERE (p.NomFr = 'kouki' AND p.PrenomFr = 'bochra') OR (p.NomFr = 'bochra' AND p.PrenomFr = 'kouki')

d7d9f12439bc2f8f7d16e9672d75543d.sql_template:
SELECT c.CODECLASSEFR, c.NOMCLASSEFR 
FROM eleve e 
JOIN personne p ON e.IdPersonne = p.id 
JOIN inscriptioneleve ie ON e.id = ie.Eleve 
JOIN classe c ON ie.Classe = c.id 
WHERE p.NomFr = 'BOUTITI' AND p.PrenomFr = 'Rimes' AND ie.annuler = '0'

a0b8081a0071657a41ab84b073c80a14.question_template: donne moi la classe de BOUTITI Rimes
a0b8081a0071657a41ab84b073c80a14.sql_template:
SELECT c.CODECLASSEFR 
FROM eleve e 
JOIN personne p ON e.IdPersonne = p.id 
JOIN inscriptioneleve ie ON e.id = ie.Eleve 
JOIN classe c ON ie.Classe = c.id 
WHERE p.NomFr = 'BOUTITI' AND p.PrenomFr = 'Rimes'

1a39ea23f3b36813650917869238dee5.question_template: donne moi la classe de HMISSI Tasnim
1a39ea23f3b36813650917869238dee5.sql_template:
SELECT c.CODECLASSEFR 
FROM eleve e 
JOIN personne p ON e.IdPersonne = p.id 
JOIN inscriptioneleve ie ON e.id = ie.Eleve 
JOIN classe c ON ie.Classe = c.id 
WHERE p.NomFr = 'HMISSI' AND p.PrenomFr = 'Tasnim' AND ie.annuler = '0'

ddf88982d1e1e39dc79fd166648ca69f.sql_template: SELECT p.id FROM personne p WHERE (p.NomFr = '{NomFr}' AND p.PrenomFr = '{PrenomFr}') OR (p.NomFr = '{PrenomFr}' AND p.PrenomFr = '{NomFr}')

45ac8473149dc8faa662001309a95f93.question_template: donne moi l'enfant de boutiti olfa
45ac8473149dc8faa662001309a95f93.sql_template:
SELECT p.NomFr, p.PrenomFr 
FROM eleve e 
JOIN personne pe ON e.IdPersonne = pe.id 
JOIN parenteleve pelev ON e.id = pelev.eleve 
JOIN parent pa ON pelev.parent = pa.id 
JOIN personne p ON pa.personne = p.id 
WHERE p.NomFr = 'boutiti' AND p.PrenomFr = 'olfa'

fad487930476f7d362b218261d8e1fd9.sql_template:
SELECT em.libematifr AS matiere, ed.moyemati AS moyenne, ex.codeperiexam AS codeTrimestre 
FROM Eduperiexam ex, Edumoymaticopie ed, Edumatiere em, Eleve e, personne p
WHERE e.idedusrv = ed.idenelev 
AND ed.codemati = em.codemati 
AND ex.codeperiexam = ed.codeperiexam 
AND e.Idpersonne = p.id 
AND p.NomFr = 'benabda' 
AND p.PrenomFr = 'malak' 
AND ed.moyemati NOT LIKE '0.00'

0f89096f64e804eba85bacd9dc3fa279.sql_template:
SELECT em.libematifr AS matiere, ed.moyemati AS moyenne, ex.codeperiexam AS codeTrimestre 
FROM Eduperiexam ex, Edumoymaticopie ed, Edumatiere em, Eleve e, personne p
WHERE e.idedusrv = ed.idenelev 
AND ed.codemati = em.codemati 
AND ex.codeperiexam = ed.codeperiexam 
AND e.Idpersonne = p.id 
AND p.NomFr = '{NomFr}' 
AND p.PrenomFr = '{PrenomFr}' 
AND ed.moyemati NOT LIKE '0.00'

06bf9c4120ebc001715fc99761e7a9b5.sql_template:
SELECT p.NomFr, p.PrenomFr 
FROM eleve e 
JOIN parenteleve pe ON e.id = pe.eleve 
JOIN parent pa ON pe.parent = pa.id 
JOIN personne p ON e.IdPersonne = p.id 
JOIN personne pp ON pa.personne = pp.id 
WHERE (pp.NomFr = '{NomFr}' AND pp.PrenomFr = '{PrenomFr}') OR (pp.PrenomFr = '{NomFr}' AND pp.NomFr = '{PrenomFr}')

65bdf4951993d164327f00f5c98aee90.question_template: donne moi les numeros de teslphones de {NomFr} {PrenomFr}
65bdf4951993d164327f00f5c98aee90.sql_template: SELECT p.Tel1, p.Tel2 FROM personne p WHERE (p.NomFr = '{NomFr}' AND p.PrenomFr = '{PrenomFr}') OR (p.NomFr = '{PrenomFr}' AND p.PrenomFr = '{NomFr}')

079bdad6b7e86eb909365f8b886cbdad.question_template: donne moi les numeros de teslphones des parents de  {NomFr} {PrenomFr}
079bdad6b7e86eb909365f8b886cbdad.sql_template:
SELECT DISTINCT p.Tel1, p.Tel2 
FROM parent pa 
JOIN personne p ON pa.personne = p.id 
JOIN parenteleve pe ON pa.id = pe.parent 
JOIN eleve e ON pe.eleve = e.id 
JOIN personne pe ON e.IdPersonne = pe.id 
WHERE pe.NomFr = '{NomFr}' AND pe.PrenomFr = '{PrenomFr}'

0292c3998d62d25217e4e747f570bf8e.question_template: donne moi les coordonnes des parents de {NomFr} {PrenomFr}
0292c3998d62d25217e4e747f570bf8e.sql_template:
SELECT p.NomFr, p.PrenomFr, p.Tel1, p.Tel2, p.AdresseFr 
FROM parent pa 
JOIN personne p ON pa.personne = p.id 
JOIN parenteleve pe ON pa.id = pe.parent 
JOIN eleve e ON pe.eleve = e.id 
JOIN personne pe ON e.IdPersonne = pe.id 
WHERE pe.NomFr = '{NomFr}' AND pe.PrenomFr = '{PrenomFr}'

b046cbe5072668cd850628bb5e73a681.question_template: donne moi les informations des parents de {NomFr} {PrenomFr}
b046cbe5072668cd850628bb5e73a681.sql_template:
SELECT p.NomFr, p.PrenomFr, p.AdresseFr, p.Tel1, p.Tel2
FROM parent pa
JOIN personne p ON pa.personne = p.id
JOIN parenteleve pe ON pa.id = pe.parent
JOIN eleve e ON pe.eleve = e.id
JOIN personne pe ON e.IdPersonne = pe.id
WHERE pe.NomFr = '{NomFr}' AND pe.PrenomFr = '{PrenomFr}'

9b500439e22317b3a8d3e74bc7db5d49.sql_template:
SELECT 
    p.NomFr AS NomEnseignant, 
    p.PrenomFr AS PrenomEnseignant, 
    m.NomMatiereFr AS Matiere, 
    s.nomSalleFr AS Salle, 
    sd.debut AS DebutSeance, 
    sf.fin AS FinSeance, 
    j.libelleJourFr AS Jour
FROM 
    emploidutemps edt
JOIN 
    enseingant e ON edt.enseignant = e.id
JOIN 
    personne p ON e.idpersonne = p.id
JOIN 
    matiere m ON edt.matiere = m.id
JOIN 
    salle s ON edt.salle = s.id
JOIN 
    seance sd ON edt.SeanceDebut = sd.id
JOIN 
    seance sf ON edt.SeanceFin = sf.id
JOIN 
    jour j ON edt.jour = j.id
JOIN 
    classe c ON edt.classe = c.id
WHERE 
    c.CODECLASSEFR = '4SC1'
ORDER BY 
    j.id, sd.debut

5e63cf264018439d68f0abe3fd5680f1.question_template: donne moi l'attestaion de BOUTITI Rimes
5e63cf264018439d68f0abe3fd5680f1.sql_template:
SELECT p.NomFr, p.PrenomFr, c.CODECLASSEFR, n.NOMNIVFR, a.AnneeScolaire
FROM eleve e
JOIN personne p ON e.IdPersonne = p.id
JOIN inscriptioneleve ie ON e.id = ie.Eleve
JOIN classe c ON ie.Classe = c.id
JOIN niveau n ON c.IDNIV = n.id
JOIN anneescolaire a ON ie.AnneeScolaire = a.id
WHERE p.NomFr = 'BOUTITI' AND p.PrenomFr = 'Rimes' AND ie.annuler = '0'

a68e9d01cb29d91ae9186ba67b499f52.sql_template:
SELECT anneescolaire.AnneeScolaire, COUNT(*) as nombre_inscriptions 
FROM inscriptioneleve 
JOIN anneescolaire ON inscriptioneleve.AnneeScolaire = anneescolaire.id 
WHERE inscriptioneleve.annuler = '0' 
GROUP BY anneescolaire.AnneeScolaire

c635654b4fa2ca76a66b36ecd2491058.question_template: donne moi les coordonné des parents de benabda melek
c635654b4fa2ca76a66b36ecd2491058.sql_template:
SELECT p.NomFr, p.PrenomFr, p.Tel1, p.Tel2, p.AdresseFr
FROM parent pa
JOIN personne p ON pa.personne = p.id
JOIN parenteleve pe ON pa.id = pe.parent
JOIN eleve e ON pe.eleve = e.id
JOIN personne pe ON e.IdPersonne = pe.id
WHERE pe.NomFr = 'benabda' AND pe.PrenomFr = 'melek'

9e939300aca3b7e21d08b34c49bac865.question_template: donne moi les coordonné des parents de benabda malak
9e939300aca3b7e21d08b34c49bac865.sql_template:
SELECT p.NomFr, p.PrenomFr, p.Tel1, p.Tel2, p.AdresseFr
FROM parent pa
JOIN personne p ON pa.personne = p.id
JOIN parenteleve pe ON pa.id = pe.parent
JOIN eleve e ON pe.eleve = e.id
JOIN personne pe ON e.IdPersonne = pe.id
WHERE pe.NomFr = 'benabda' AND pe.PrenomFr = 'malak'
